title: Viewfinder Series: Akihito Takaba's Refined Summer Vacation
description: Dangerous love that melt your body and heart.Invitation which is given by acceding on the summer beach...but it's a sweet trap by Asami.Enjoy unpublished episode of much-loved series all over the world, Viewfinder Series!Age 18+Explicit contentSuggested for mature readers
author: Ayano Yamane
